views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10, 11 and 12.

NoMoreDisabled is a Tiny Tweak that Prevents the Permanent Passcode Locking!

You will be not Disabled Anymore from too Many Incorrect Passcode Attempts!

If you put too Many Invalid Codes After stopping, you will have to wait about a Minute for putting the Correct one Again, but the Device will still be Usable in the LockScreen!

No options to Configure.

See Screenshot below (thanks My Pina Pana ðŸ‘½).

Thanks @karimouni24 for testing.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!
